column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I bought a little flowering tree at a local greenhouse .
#id=2
#text=It came with its roots bundled up in burlap , or something that looks like burlap .
#id=3
#text=I dug a hole about two feet deep in my front yard , where I wanted the tree to grow .
#id=4
#text=The instructions said to leave the roots in the bag .
#id=5
#text=The bag would naturally rot away with time and the roots would poke out of it as they grew .
#id=6
#text=Once my hole was dug , I moved the tree over to the spot and put it in the hole .
#id=7
#text=I then started filling up the hole I 'd made with the dirt that I 'd dug up .
#id=8
#text=I made sure the tree was standing straight and I tamped down the loose dirt by walking on it until the tree seemed to be firmly in place .
#id=9
#text=I then put some mulch around the base of the tree in a circle .
#text=That 's supposed to help the area retain moisture , which the tree needs to survive .
#text=After that , I took out the hose and watered the tree a little to give it a good start in life .
